issue.title: `gz sdf -p model.sdf` prints the sdf description, not a file in the current folder

content.html:
To figure this out I recompiled sdformat with the following patch:

diff -r 367776c8ad3d src/parser.cc
--- a/src/parser.cc Sat Dec 09 05:41:27 2017 +0000
+++ b/src/parser.cc Fri Jan 05 18:08:25 2018 -0800
@@ -294,6 +294,9 @@
            << xmlDoc.ErrorDesc() << '\n';
     return false;
   }
+  std::cerr << "Begin: XmlDoc.Print()" << std::endl;
+  xmlDoc.Print();
+  std::cerr << "End:   XmlDoc.Print()" << std::endl;
   if (readDoc(&xmlDoc, _sdf, filename))
     return true;
   else

So I saw that it was printing out the model.sdf file hosted inside sdformat itself.
